meanings.definition: A meeting or assembly, especially of a legislative or deliberative body.
meanings.sent1: The gemotes gathered to discuss new laws for the town.
meanings.sent2: The annual gemotes of the council were always well attended.
meanings.sent3: The gemotes turned into a lively debate about the best way to plant flowers.
meanings.sent4: In the gemotes of nature, the birds and bees held their own parliament.
meanings.sent5: The gemotes echoed with the voices of those eager to make a difference.

meanings.definition: To hold a meeting or assembly.
meanings.sent1: Let's gemotes next week to plan the charity event.
meanings.sent2: She gemotes regularly to keep her team informed.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels gemotes under the oak tree to discuss their nut collection strategy.
meanings.sent4: The stars gemotes in the night sky, sharing their twinkling secrets.
meanings.sent5: Gemotes with friends can lead to great ideas and fun times.
